channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘If I can’t afford a first-class ticket, I don’t fly’: Airlines should raise prices to reduce the number of passengers. Am I wrong?
item.description: “The airlines have crammed every last bit of humanity onto planes. They offer horrible service.”

item.title: Does Warren Buffett Know Something That We Don't?
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway is hoarding cash in a pattern seen before the financial crisis, but it has a new reason this time.

item.title: ‘The gardener talked’: My grandmother gave her next-door neighbor $6,000 to buy a car. How can I protect her?
item.description: “The neighbor is living it up and — lo and behold! — and there is no vehicle.”

item.title: Metal Prices Mixed after Disappointing China Stimulus Prompted Sell-off
item.description: Base metal prices were mixed as copper and other industrial metals sold-off late last week after the Chinese government’s debt package disappointed ma...

item.title: Hedge-Funds Hit by 'Arbageddon' Sense Brighter Future After Trump Win
item.description: Some people in the hedge-fund industry hope the president-elect will breathe new life into the business.

item.title: Richard Gere is moving to Spain after unloading his $10.75 million Connecticut home
item.description: Gere bought the estate from Paul Simon to start a farm, but now says he wants to relocate his entire family to Spain.

item.title: Stock Futures Edge Higher
item.description: Stock futures edged higher early Monday and with the election in the rear-view mirror, investors will turn this week to the latest inflation data and ...

item.title: Higher U.S. Growth Could Hurt Long-Dated Bonds
item.description: The assumption of higher nominal growth in the U.S. over the coming quarters is generally a bearish signal for bonds, Julius Baer said, but it sees op...

item.title: For billionaire Mark Cuban, luxury real estate in a prime location trumps politics
item.description: Though the ‘Shark Tank’ star and entrepreneur has been a vocal critic of Donald Trump, he still hangs on to his lux N.Y. condo in the Trump tower.

item.title: ‘I’ve no interest in investing more money in the stock market’: I’m debt-free, retired and ignoring the ‘Trump bump.’ What should I do with $400,000 in cash?
item.description: “I already have $1.5 million in the stock market.”
